Name: Miss Esme
Desc: In the name of Starshine, I shall alter the course of destiny!

1.Name: Starbeam Transformation
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Transform and take flight, randomly summoning three <color=#FFFFFF>Spectral Bubbles</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Twinkling Stars</color> in quick succession:
When a character touches a <color=#FFFFFF>Spectral Bubble</color> they restore HP.
When a character touches a <color=#FFFFFF>Twinkling Star</color> they regain Energy.
The greater the on-field character's HP percentage, the higher the chance Miss Esme has of summoning a <color=#FFFFFF>Twinkling Star</color>.

1.Name: Starshine Shift
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Spook Shack</color> character(s) in your squad:
When a character touches a <color=#FFFFFF>Spectral Bubble</color>, HP recovered increases by 20%.
When a character touches a <color=#FFFFFF>Twinkling Star</color>, Energy generated increases by 20%.

2.Name: Starshine Shift
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Spook Shack</color> character(s) in your squad:
When a character touches a <color=#FFFFFF>Spectral Bubble</color>, HP recovered increases by 25%.
When a character touches a <color=#FFFFFF>Twinkling Star</color>, Energy generated increases by 25%.

3.Name: Starshine Shift
3.Desc:

1.Name: Stellar Bomb
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Hurl a magical bomb, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and accumulating massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color>.
